mapper.sql: SELECT t.id id, t.cust_id custId, t.cert_type certType, t.cert_no certNo, t.bank_type bankType, t.bank_name bankName, t.bank_city bankCity, t.bank_add bankAdd, t.card_no cardNo, t.cust_name custName, t.state state, t.trade_state tradeState, t.create_time createTime, t.modify_time modifyTime, t.create_user_id createUserId, t.b_bank_info_id bBankInfoId, t.a_bank_info_id aBankInfoId, t.order_no orderNo, t.file_path filePath, t.resp_code respCode, t.resp_msg respMsg, t.type type, t.mobile mobile, t.pass_time passTime, t.pass_user_id passUserId, t.effect_time effectTime, t.mchn mchn, t.seq_no seqNo FROM `t_gq_fss_changecard_record` t
mapper.select:
AND t.cust_name Like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{custName}),'%')
AND t.mobile Like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{mobile}),'%')
AND t.cert_no Like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{certNo}),'%')
AND t.state=#{state}
order by t.create_time desc

SELECT t.mchn mchn, t.type trade_type, t.seq_no seq_no, t.acc_no acc_no, t.bank_city city_id, t.bank_type bank_id, t.card_no bank_card FROM `t_gq_fss_changecard_record` t WHERE t.seq_no=#{seq_no} AND t.mchn=#{mchn}
